Class Configuration<C extends Configuration<C>>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - The type of a configuration.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, Freezable<C>, IFluentObject<C>, Namable<C>, Named, OptionalNamable<C>, Resettable<C>, Typed, TypeRequestable, Specifiable<C>, Specified

    DeepConfiguration, StandardConfiguration

extends OptionalNamableElement<C>
implements Freezable<C>
